privacy.title: Introduction
privacy.content: At KG Aircraft Consulting, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

privacy.title: Data Collection
privacy.content: We may collect and process the following personal data: Name, email address, and contact details provided via contact forms or subscriptions. Usage data such as IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

privacy.title: Purpose of Data Processing
privacy.content: The data we collect is used to: Respond to inquiries and provide requested services. Improve our website’s functionality and user experience. Send updates, newsletters, or promotional content (with your consent).

privacy.title: Sharing of Data
privacy.content: Your data will not be shared with third parties without your consent, except where required by law or necessary to fulfill our services.

privacy.title: Data Retention
privacy.content: Your personal data will only be retained for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

privacy.title: Your Rights
privacy.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to: Access your personal data and request corrections or deletion. Withdraw your consent for data processing at any time. File a complaint with a data protection authority if you believe your rights have been violated.

privacy.title: Cookies
privacy.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
